plot: Two brothers on opposite sides of the law battle it out on the streets of New York in this chill-inducing thriller, a follow-up to BRIMSTONE. â€” As the previous installment came to a close, vicious dogs and armed men surrounded FBI Special Agent Aloysius Pendergast and his demise seemed certain. Nevertheless, he did leave behind a legacy: a letter for his friend, NYPD Lieutenant Vincent D'Agosta. Its contents ask D'Agosta to assume the responsibility of pursuing Pendergast's younger brother Diogenes, an insane and vengeful genius who has sworn to commit the perfect crime on January 28 -- which is now only one week away.
characters: Aloysius X.L. Pendergast, Constance Greene, Nora Kelly, Diogenes Pendergast, Eli Glinn, Corrie Swanson, Margo Green, William Smithback, Laura Hayward, Proctor, Viola Maskelene, Cornelia Delamere Pendergast, Mime, Hugo Menzies, Spencer Coffey, Bryce Harriman, Larry Enderby, Vincent D'Agosta
setting: New York State New York City, New York Long Island, New York
